name: Pendulum Xyz
text: Target 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones; Special Summon both targets, but negate their effects (if any), and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster using only those 2 monsters. (You can treat the Level of 1 of those monsters as the other monster's.) You can only activate 1 "Pendulum Xyz" per turn.
